title: AI-Powered Tech Supercharges Ocean Cleanup, Boosting Plastic Collection by 60%
title_zh: 人工智能技术为海洋清理提速，塑料收集量提升60%
author: Institute for Operations Research
summary: As plastic pollution in the world's oceans reaches critical levels, artificial intelligence-driven algorithms can dramatically accelerate plastic waste removal, boosting efficiency by more than 60%. A new routing algorithm optimizes the paths of plastic-collecting ships, and the technology is already deployed by The Ocean Cleanup in the Pacific Ocean.
summary_zh: 随着海洋塑料污染达到危急水平，人工智能驱动的算法可以显著加速塑料废物清除，将效率提高60%以上。新的路线优化算法为塑料收集船规划最佳路径，该技术已被海洋清理项目在太平洋部署使用。

paragraphs.en: As plastic pollution in the world's oceans reaches critical levels, recently published research reveals how artificial intelligence-driven algorithms can dramatically accelerate plastic waste removal, boosting efficiency by more than 60%. The study, published in the journal Operations Research and titled "Optimizing the Path Towards Plastic-Free Oceans," introduces a data-driven routing algorithm that optimizes the path of plastic-collecting ships, allowing The Ocean Cleanup, a leading environmental nonprofit, to extract more waste in less time.
paragraphs.zh: 随着世界海洋中的塑料污染达到危急水平，最近发表的研究揭示了人工智能驱动的算法如何显著加速塑料废物清除，将效率提高60%以上。这项发表在《运筹学》期刊上的研究题为「优化通往无塑料海洋之路」，介绍了一种数据驱动的路线优化算法，可优化塑料收集船的航行路径，使领先的环保非营利组织海洋清理项目能够在更短时间内清除更多废物。

notes.explain: 数据驱动的，指基于数据分析而非直觉做出决策的方法
提高效率，boost 表示显著提升、推动

paragraphs.en: "With analytics, we can dramatically improve plastic removal efforts in the ocean," says Dick den Hertog of the University of Amsterdam. "By optimizing routes in real time, we ensure every sweep collects as much plastic as possible, making cleanup operations significantly more effective." Until now, ocean cleanup efforts have relied on relatively simple routing strategies. This study, conducted between 2022 and 2024, revolutionizes the process with a sophisticated AI-powered optimization model.
paragraphs.zh: 「有了数据分析，我们可以大幅改善海洋塑料清除工作」，阿姆斯特丹大学的迪克·登·赫托格表示。「通过实时优化路线，我们确保每一次清扫都能收集尽可能多的塑料，使清理工作显著更有效。」迄今为止，海洋清理工作一直依赖相对简单的路线策略。这项于2022年至2024年进行的研究，用先进的AI驱动优化模型彻底改变了这一过程。

notes.explain: 实时地，指数据处理与事件发生同步进行
每次清扫，sweep 在这里指清理船的一次航行/作业周期

paragraphs.en: The challenge was identifying the most efficient paths for plastic-collecting ships in an ever-changing ocean environment. The breakthrough came in the form of a nonlinear path optimization algorithm that finds the best collection routes within seconds, even at massive scale. The impact has been a 60% increase in plastic collection, removing significantly more waste without increasing costs. Ocean currents, wind patterns, and plastic density all vary continuously, making traditional fixed-route planning inadequate.
paragraphs.zh: 挑战在于在不断变化的海洋环境中为塑料收集船确定最有效的路径。突破来自一种非线性路径优化算法，它能在几秒钟内找到最佳收集路线，即使规模巨大。其影响是塑料收集量增加了60%，在不增加成本的情况下清除的废物显著增多。洋流、风型和塑料密度都在不断变化，使传统的固定路线规划变得不足。

notes.explain: 大规模地，指在很大范围或数量上应用

notes.phrase: breakthrough came in the form of
notes.explain: 突破以...形式出现，正式表达某事物是解决方案

paragraphs.en: This research comes at a crucial time as ocean plastic pollution reaches more than 170 trillion plastic particles, according to recent estimates. As global attention focuses on climate change, ocean plastic pollution remains an urgent but often overlooked crisis. "Our work demonstrates that AI and operations research aren't just for finance or tech—they can actively solve environmental challenges," says Jean Pauphilet of London Business School. "With smarter analytics, we can make ocean cleanup efforts far more effective and get closer to a plastic-free future."
paragraphs.zh: 根据最近估计，这项研究正值关键时刻，海洋塑料污染已超过170万亿个塑料颗粒。尽管全球关注点集中在气候变化上，海洋塑料污染仍然是一个紧迫但常被忽视的危机。「我们的工作表明，人工智能和运筹学不仅适用于金融或科技——它们可以积极解决环境挑战」，伦敦商学院的让·波菲利特表示。「借助更智能的分析，我们可以使海洋清理工作更加有效，并更接近无塑料的未来。」

notes.explain: 常被忽视的，overlook 表示忽略、未充分重视
更接近（目标），表示朝某方向取得进展

paragraphs.en: Unlike many research projects that remain theoretical, this AI-powered solution is already in use. The Ocean Cleanup has integrated the algorithm into its operational software, actively improving plastic removal in the Pacific Ocean. It supports the United Nations Sustainable Development Goal No. 14, Life Below Water, by increasing cleanup efficiency. The technology could also be adapted for other large-scale environmental cleanup efforts, from river pollution to disaster recovery.
paragraphs.zh: 与许多仍停留在理论层面的研究项目不同，这种AI驱动的解决方案已经投入使用。海洋清理项目已将该算法集成到其操作软件中，正在积极改善太平洋的塑料清除工作。它通过提高清理效率，支持联合国可持续发展目标14——水下生物。该技术还可以适用于其他大规模环境清理工作，从河流污染到灾难恢复。

notes.explain: 仍停留在理论阶段，指尚未实际应用
水下生物，联合国SDG目标14的官方表述

paragraphs.en: "Our research proves that AI-driven optimization can be a game-changer for environmental efforts," says Bruno Sainte-Rose of The Ocean Cleanup. "This is a tangible step toward solving one of the planet's most pressing ecological crises." The findings show that advanced analytics and AI can amplify the impact of existing environmental initiatives without major new infrastructure investments. For conservationists battling plastic pollution, that represents both hope and a practical path forward.
paragraphs.zh: 「我们的研究证明，AI驱动的优化可以成为环保工作的游戏规则改变者」，海洋清理项目的布鲁诺·圣罗斯表示。「这是解决地球上最紧迫的生态危机之一的可喜一步。」研究结果表明，先进的分析和AI可以在不进行重大新基础设施投资的情况下，放大现有环保举措的影响。对于与塑料污染作斗争的保护主义者来说，这既代表着希望，也代表着一条切实可行的前进道路。

notes.explain: 游戏规则改变者，指彻底改变某领域的方式或结果的事物
切实的一步，tangible 表示可感知的、具体的

vocabulary.example: A nonlinear path optimization algorithm finds the best collection routes within seconds.
The Ocean Cleanup is a leading environmental nonprofit.
This study revolutionizes the process with a sophisticated AI-powered optimization model.
The Ocean Cleanup has integrated the algorithm into its operational software.
Advanced analytics and AI can amplify the impact of existing environmental initiatives.
This is a tangible step toward solving one of the planet's most pressing ecological crises.

discussion_questions.en: Besides ocean cleanup ships, what other applications might benefit from AI-driven route optimization for environmental purposes?
discussion_questions.zh: 除了海洋清理船之外，还有哪些环保应用可能受益于AI驱动的路线优化？

discussion_questions.en: The article mentions 170 trillion plastic particles in the ocean. How should we balance cleanup efforts with preventing plastic from entering oceans in the first place?
discussion_questions.zh: 文章提到海洋中有170万亿个塑料颗粒。我们应如何平衡清理努力与从源头防止塑料进入海洋？

discussion_questions.en: Why might ocean plastic pollution be "often overlooked" compared to climate change? What can be done to raise its profile?
discussion_questions.zh: 与气候变化相比，为什么海洋塑料污染可能「常被忽视」？可以采取什么措施来提高其关注度？
